doc:
Alan Badel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alan_Badel 0 Alan Fernand Badel (; 11 September 1923 – 19 March 1982) was an English stage actor who also appeared frequently in the cinema, radio and television and was noted for his richly textured voice which was once described as "the sound of tears". Alan_Fernand_Badel ( ; 11_September_1923 – 19_March_1982 ) was an_English_stage_actor who also appeared frequently in the_cinema_,_radio_and_television and was_noted for his_richly_textured_voice which was_once_described as " the_sound of tears " .
